title: VIE013 Data Centre
description: The VIE013 Data Centre in Vienna, Austria, is a state-of-the-art facility designed to deliver high performance and reliability. AKRO Solutions provided comprehensive BIM services, including advanced modeling, coordination, and prefabrication detailing for all critical systems. The project focused on efficiency, scalability, and future-proofing the infrastructure for evolving client needs.

packages.title: Mechanical Package
packages.description: Critical Cooling / Comfort Cooling / DX Refrigeration / Heating / Ventilation

packages.title: Fire Package
packages.description: Gas Suppression / Foam System / 3D Fire Elements / Fire Distinguishes

stage5.additional: Management / Stage 5 Revit / BIM Family Creation / Clash Detection / BWIC layouts

packages.title: Point Cloud Survey / As Installed Updates
